startIndex.description: Optional. The record index to start at. All items with a lower index will be dropped from the results.

limit.description: Optional. The maximum number of records to return.

userId.description: Optional. Supply a user id to search within a user's library or omit to search all.

searchTerm.description: The search term to filter on.

includeItemTypes.description: If specified, only results with the specified item types are returned. This allows multiple, comma delimeted.

excludeItemTypes.description: If specified, results with these item types are filtered out. This allows multiple, comma delimeted.

mediaTypes.description: If specified, only results with the specified media types are returned. This allows multiple, comma delimeted.

parentId.description: If specified, only children of the parent are returned.

includePeople.description: Optional filter whether to include people.

includeMedia.description: Optional filter whether to include media.

includeGenres.description: Optional filter whether to include genres.

includeStudios.description: Optional filter whether to include studios.

includeArtists.description: Optional filter whether to include artists.

$ul: **SearchHints**: Gets or sets the search hints.
**TotalRecordCount**: Gets or sets the total record count.
